name: task
description:
~ Have you ever felt like a mouse? In fact you don't need to feel, because the mouse itself is you right now. Don't try to do any mischef, be good, maybe they give cheese. Pay attention to the decisions you make, might be reason of your die, I said. Everything is for science said William,though you haven't met yet, I am sure if you knew him, you would loved, at least in the beginning. Lets look to your number, is 312? This is so much, anyway after this your name is 312, have fun with our boys !

So what this game offer me ?

  • A cube ? So boring.

  • Ride a plane ? It looks like dangerous.

  • WHAT IS THIS BOMB ?

~ You can see more be as subject :)

Why early access ?

~ In order to see our shortcomings in the game, to do better, to provide the budget and to leave a good game with the feedback we receive from the community! Of course, we are aware of the shortcomings of the game in the early access version, but sometimes financial support and sometimes only the return of the players are enough to fix them. If you too want to influence the game's destiny, you can join our community and give us feedback!


~ Our discord ! -> vcj7erszT9
~ Your opinions and criticisms are always important for us!
